content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, thank you for showing interest in my apartment in Munich. As a landlord, I want to make sure that I receive the highest possible rental price for my property. May I ask what you are willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would prefer to negotiate on the rental price. Can you tell me what you are expecting?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Certainly, as a landlord, I am looking for a rental price that will maximize my gains. However, I am open to negotiation to find a mutually beneficial agreement. May I ask what you are willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 300 Euros per month.

I have some questions regarding the lease agreement. Can you provide me with a sample lease agreement?

I would also like to know if I can make any changes to the apartment, such as painting or installing new fixtures.

Can you tell me how much the security deposit is?

I would like to move in on June 1st.

Can you provide me with any references or testimonials from previous tenants?
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for your interest in the apartment. As a landlord, I am willing to negotiate on the rental price. Based on your offer of 300 Euros per month, I am willing to accept.

Regarding the lease agreement, I can provide you with a sample agreement that outlines the terms and conditions of the rental. The lease agreement will include information on the length of the lease, rental payments, security deposit, and any other important details.

As for changes to the apartment, I am generally open to reasonable modifications that do not damage the property. However, any changes must be approved in advance and may require additional fees.

The security deposit for the apartment is 200 Euros. This will be returned to you at the end of the lease term, provided that you have fulfilled your obligations under the lease agreement.

As for moving in on June 1st, that is possible. However, I will need to confirm with my other tenants and make arrangements for the handover of the apartment.

Unfortunately, I do not have any references or testimonials from previous tenants as I am a new landlord. However, I can provide you with references from other properties that I have managed in the past.

I hope this information is helpful. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
